BR.name: Harvest Moon®: Skytree Village
BR.description: Muitas pessoas já moraram na Skytree Village, e a área era verde e exuberante. Entretanto o poder da Deusa da Colheita, foi gradualmente se esvaindo e a terra começou a ficar seca e infértil. É sua missão reviver as sete Skytrees para trazer vida de volta a esta terra desolada! Com tutoriais amigáveis, você poderá ir direto ao que interessa, personalizando sua fazenda ao elevar ou rebaixar o terreno, criando rios, poços e mais. Ferramentas aperfeiçoadas irão te ajudar a moldar o terreno com mais eficiência. Depois você pode ficar tranquilo e relaxar em seu barquinho enquanto pesca. Jogue com um garoto ou uma garota, atraia solteiras ou solteiros e comece uma família! Elenco de personagens totalmente novos, com um novo tipo de arte! Molde seu terreno do jeito que quiser! Cuide de um animal novo: o jumento Poitou! Tutoriais e mecânicas rurais fáceis! Ferramentas melhoradas ajudam a modificar o terreno de forma mais eficiente!

CA.name: Harvest Moon®: Skytree Village
CA.description: Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green. However, the power of the Harvest Goddess gradually began to wane, and the land became parched and dry. It's up to you revive the seven Skytrees to bring life back to this desolate land! With user-friendly tutorials, you will immediately be able to jump into the thick of things, customizing your farm by raising and lowering the land, creating rivers, ponds, and more. Upgraded tools will assist you shaping the land more efficiently, and afterwards you can kick back and relax in your boat to do a spot of fishing! Play as a boy or a girl, woo bachelors and bachelorettes, and start a family! Completely new cast of characters with a brand new art style! Terraform your land any way you like! Care for a brand new animal: the Poitou donkey! User-friendly tutorials and farming mechanics! Upgraded tools will help in shaping the land more efficiently!

MX.name: Harvest Moon®: Skytree Village
MX.description: Mucha gente solía vivir en Skytree Village, y la tierra allí era verde y exuberante. Sin embargo, el poder de la Diosa de la Cosecha comenzó a menguar gradualmente y la tierra se volvió reseca y árida. ¡Tu tarea es revivir los siete Skytrees para devolverle la vitalidad a esta tierra desolada! Siguiendo los sencillos tutoriales, podrás colocarte inmediatamente en el centro de la acción y personalizar tu granja, aumentando o reduciendo la altura de tus tierras, creando ríos, estanques y mucho más. A medida que consigas herramientas de mayor categoría, podrás darle forma a la tierra de manera más eficiente y después de esto, ¡puedes relajarte en tu bote e ir de pesca! Juega como varón o mujer, conquista a solteros o solteras, ¡y comienza tu propia familia! ¡Presentación de personajes completamente renovada con un nuevo diseño artístico! ¡Dale a tus tierras la forma que más te guste! Cuida de un nuevo animal: ¡el burro de Poitou! ¡Tutoriales y técnicas agrícolas fáciles de usar! ¡Las herramientas de mayor categoría te ayudarán a darle forma a tu tierra de manera más eficiente

US.name: Harvest Moon®: Skytree Village
US.description: Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green. However, the power of the Harvest Goddess gradually began to wane, and the land became parched and dry. It's up to you revive the seven Skytrees to bring life back to this desolate land! With user-friendly tutorials, you will immediately be able to jump into the thick of things, customizing your farm by raising and lowering the land, creating rivers, ponds, and more. Upgraded tools will assist you shaping the land more efficiently, and afterwards you can kick back and relax in your boat to do a spot of fishing! Play as a boy or a girl, woo bachelors and bachelorettes, and start a family! Completely new cast of characters with a brand new art style! Terraform your land any way you like! Care for a brand new animal: the Poitou donkey! User-friendly tutorials and farming mechanics! Upgraded tools will help in shaping the land more efficiently!
